item.description:
Sorry for last minute notice, but my usual games group was going to have a fun night of games Thurs. night, and it got cancelled so I've invited them to my home and am extending the invitation to you all as well! Feel free to come, bring a snack and if you have any fun board games, bring them as well. I also have ping pong! email me if any questions! Not sure what the turn out will be, but we'll have fun no matter what.

Let your GPS take you to my mailbox.

When you see the mailbox on moon road, turn on to the street right there, and it's the first house on the right... big cedar home...

Weather permitting, we may have an outdoor fire pit going too!

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Play games at Marion's in Ashford
